name: The Boring Company
description: The Boring Company (TBC) was founded by Elon Musk to revolutionize transportation. Its mission is to solve traffic, beautify cities & expand rapid point-to-point transportation by creating safe, fast-to-dig, and low-cost transportation, utility, and freight tunnels. TBC has spent 5 years building core technologies designed to solve traffic and beautify cities via Loop and Hyperloop.
